metadata.title: CVE-2021-28971 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In intel_pmu_drain_pebs_nhm in arch/x86/events/intel/ds.c in the Linuxkernel through 5.11.8 on some Haswell CPUs, userspace applications (such asperf-fuzzer) can cause a system crash because the PEBS status in a PEBSrecord is mishandled, aka CID-d88d05a9e0b6.
